name: Cratejoy
long_description:
Cratejoy is the only all-in-one subscription box solution to help you launch, grow and scale your company. We provide the leading subscription box platform that allows you to launch and grow your business faster and more efficiently - no coding or plug-ins required.

We support over 2,500 companies on our platform and over 1 million subscribers on the Cratejoy Marketplace. Founded in 2014, Cratejoy is headquartered in Austin, TX
one_liner: Cratejoy is the platform for subscriptions

name: Gobble
long_description:
Gobble prepares farm fresh 10-minute gourmet dinner kits with 3-step instructions delivered to your door. Our weekly delivery includes three thoughtfully hand-crafted dinner kits filled with fresh pre-chopped and par-cooked ingredients (along with a gorgeous recipe card!) for you to create Michelin-worthy dinners in your very own kitchen.

Gobble offers the convenience associated with takeout along with the health, satisfaction, and freshness of a home-cooked meal. With Michael Mina protege, Thomas Ricci, as our Executive Chef, we're engineering our best recipes into one pan dinner kits so anyone can cook and make a gourmet meal with 1 pan in under 10 minutes.
one_liner: Daily meal delivery, personalized to your tastes.

name: Billforward
long_description:
San Francisco-based BillForward a YCombinator company is comprised of talented and passionate folks who are excited by the challenges and opportunities of subscription billing.  We offer a flexible and innovative billing platform, which gives any type of recurring-payment based businesses the ability to bill customers for sophisticated products and carry out in-depth revenue analysis.

Launched in Jan 2013 the platform has already gained great traction in the Telecoms, SaaS, Product as Service and Platform as a Service industries, where product managers and CFO’s have realized that the ability to change their offering in hours, rather than weeks, can give them an edge on the competition.
one_liner: Subscription billing, rate plan management and analytics as a…

name: Platzi
all_locations: San Francisco, CA, USA; Santiago, Santiago Metropolitan Region, Chile; Mexico City, CDMX, Mexico; Madrid, Community of Madrid, Spain; Buenos Aires, CABA, Argentina; Bogotá, Bogota, Colombia; Lima, Callao Region, Peru; Remote
long_description:
Platzi cracked online education. It teaches courses on design, marketing and programming with a 70% completion rate, to over one million students worldwide.

The classes include real-time collaboration among students and industry leaders as teachers. It aims to be the professional home for lifelong learning of advanced skills.
one_liner: Latin America's School of Technology

name: Beek
long_description:
Beek is the app where latinos listen to the best audio content in Spanish from their favorite creators (audiobooks, meditations, audio series, and original content).  Users pay a subscription to access all the content, and creators make money per minute listened. 

There will be an audio platform for the 480M native Spanish speakers and Beek is the team building it.
one_liner: Leading audio subscription platform for Spanish content and creators

name: Audm
long_description: Audm is a mobile app that turns long-form print journalism into professionally narrated digital audio. The app, which was quietly launched on 2016, uses professional voice actors to read news content that makes it enjoyable to listen to.
one_liner: Audm is a subscription service providing mini-audiobooks —…

name: Curious Fictions
long_description: Read short stories on the go, tip authors for stories you love.
one_liner: Patreon for professional authors.

name: Mojo
one_liner: Mobile app for creating pro-quality social media videos

name: Secured
long_description: Our vision is that anyone with a passion for collectibles (sneakers, NFTs, sports cards, Pokemon cards etc.) will need a Secured membership to access the ultimate market advice and best connect with their community.
one_liner: Tools for Sneaker, NFT & web3 investors

name: RevenueCat
long_description:
RevenueCat is a mobile SDK and API for managing in-app subscriptions

We take the sting out of supporting the complicated subscription systems of the App Store and Google Play Store, and help you focus on running your business.
one_liner: A simple API for managing in-app subscriptions

name: The Juggernaut
long_description: The Juggernaut is a NY-based consumer subscription company and community for the South Asia-curious. Targeted subscription media is a valuable bet: Black Entertainment Television (BET) sold to Viacom for $2.3b in 2000 and Liberty Media valued Univision at $14b in 2017. The U.S. South Asia diaspora alone has over $1 trillion of spending power and is the fastest growing demographic in the U.S., yet is underserved. We're backed by some incredible investors, including Precursor Ventures (also in The Athletic, Superhuman), Kevin Lin (co-founder, Twitch), Adam Hansmann (co-founder, The Athletic), and Balaji Srinivasan (ex-Coinbase CTO, ex-GP a16z).
one_liner: The global community for the South Asia-curious

name: Wanderlog
long_description: Wanderlog is the one-stop app for planning your next vacation, with a focus on excellent design. You can track your plans in our collaborative document, discover new places to visit and hotels to book, and share travel advice with friends and fellow travelers.
one_liner: Travel planner for researching, organizing, and mapping your trip

name: Withfriends
long_description: Withfriends makes it easy for any small business to offer memberships, so that your community can subscribe to support your business. Simply connect us to your online store or point-of-sale, and we'll offer memberships to your customers during checkout. We've found 1 in 20 customers will choose to become members, bringing your business an additional 45% in revenue.
one_liner: Withfriends makes it easy to offer memberships for your small business

name: Apartio
one_liner: Apartio offers Short Term Rentals for Business Travelers in Brazil

name: Skio
long_description: Skio ($20M+ ARR & profitable, $8M seed) is subscription management software for brands on Shopify. Customers include Liquid I.V., Milk Bar, Polaroid, Barstool, Unilever, KraveBeauty, Boba Tea Protein, & Siete.
one_liner: Subscriptions for Shopify

name: The Third Place
one_liner: Subscriptions for neighborhood businesses

name: JoinSub
all_locations: Delhi, DL, India; Palo Alto, CA, USA; Remote
long_description:
We, at JoinSub, are empowering the Indian small and medium retailers to drive repeat purchases & maximize their revenue by building a subscription-based model. 

India has over 14 million retail outlets, and we are poised to revolutionize the Retail Sector and enhance the buying experience both for retailers and consumers. We are dedicated to co-creating a community of futuristic retailers who are ready to embrace tech for growth.

Our Subscription Programs work wonderfully for everyone who is looking to drive repurchases, right from those in the F&B industry, to Salons, Nail Salons, Spas, Gyms, Yoga & Dance Studios, Coffee Shops, Bakeries, Dry Cleaners, Florists, etc. We can help you delight your consumers and accelerate your business, the JoinSub Way!
one_liner: India's first aggregator and provider of local business subscriptions

name: Charge Running
long_description:
Charge Running is a community for all runners. We host 20+ live virtual running classes and races per day, where runners join and run together from all over the world through a mobile app. Each class is hosted by a live, certified run coach, that tracks all participants' distances, paces, cadences, and interval summaries as they lead the runners via audio through effort-based run classes.

Each runner can chat with the coach and other participants of the run, as well as see in real-time the distance of every other runner, no matter where they run from. This creates an incredibly motivational experience. 

In addition to our daily lineup of classes, Charge hosts virtual races, partnering with race directors and charities to offer a virtual racing experience, with an in-person feel.
one_liner: Provides live, virtual running classes to runners all around the world

name: YourQuote
long_description: YourQuote is a social writing app that helps regular people share their short-form creative writing. Much like how Instagram has turned each one of us into a photographer, YourQuote has turned 2.5 million people in India into amateur writers.
one_liner: YourQuote is India's largest writing platform

name: Rinsed
one_liner: Software to run car washes moving to a monthly subscription model

name: Measured
long_description: Measured is a telemedicine platform helping people with chronic conditions get access to affordable care. We're growing rapidly and have thousands of customers across the US.
one_liner: Telemedicine platform for chronic conditions like obesity

name: Prendea
long_description: Prendea offers live afterschool classes to Spanish-speaking kids ages 4 to 15.  For a fixed monthly price, kids can choose as many classes as they like from our large selection that ranges from TikTok choreography to astronomy.
one_liner: Live afterschool classes for Spanish-speaking kids ages 4 to 15.

name: Alltruists
long_description:
Alltruists is a subscription for at-home, kid-friendly volunteer & giving projects for families - delivered every other month.

We give kids (and grown-ups!) a way to give back anytime, anywhere. Each box is themed around one big issue in the world - from homelessness to clean water to hunger to climate action and more - and guides kids to engage with that issue in positive, meaningful ways.

In each box:

A proprietary mini-book to help kids learn about the issue at hand
1-2 empathy-building activities to help kids connect with others' experiences
1-2 unique volunteer projects designed with incredible nonprofit partners
Online giving experience where kids direct a $5 donation (included in the box) to one of three nonprofit partner projects
(There are also a few surprises in each box, little things kids can keep as reminders or touchstones so they can easily reflect on the lessons learned.)
one_liner: Kid-friendly, at-home volunteer projects in a box, delivered bimonthly

name: R.care
long_description: R.care is not just another diet program or calorie-counting app. It's a comprehensive, evidence-based solution designed to address the root causes of binge eating and provide lasting recovery. Say goodbye to waiting lists and hefty price tags, and take control of your relationship with food.
one_liner: #1 Science backed eating disorder recovery program.

name: Perfekto
long_description:
Over 1/3 of food is being thrown away and in Latin America 72% of it prior to the consumer stage. Mainly due to physical imperfections or surplus production, despite being fresh and edible.

Perfekto offers a grocery subscription box with imperfect and surplus food, home-delivered. Thereby, consumers save time and money while reducing food waste.

The founders are experienced leaders scaling startups & grocery operations. Anahí previously led the Uber Grocery initiative for Latam. Jan scaled Swiss FinTech Sonect to pre-Series B and to Mexico. Juan led Walmart's eCommerce logistics and operations in Mexico. 

By the end of 2022, Perfekto had:
🌱 rescued over 500,000kgs of food from being wasted
🚚 delivered over 60,000 orders
📈 grown 1,120% year-over-year
🥖 gone beyond just produce and now help rescue items like bread or packaged goods from companies like Heartbest Foods, Bové, Tuny - with major multinationals in the pipeline
💚 become a beloved brand with an NPS of 70
🫂 built an online community of over 20,000 people and several thousand homes receiving Perfekto boxes
one_liner: Grocery subscription service against food waste in Latam

name: Pandai
all_locations: Kuala Lumpur, Federal Territory of Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia
long_description:
💡 What is Pandai?

Pandai is an app that helps students get better grades in school. 

Pandai provides gamified quizzes aligned to a specific school curriculum, from which students can learn, practice, get feedback, and diagnose their weaknesses.

🔥 Why do we build this? 

In Southeast Asia, the education system is competitive and exam-oriented. 

There is a huge demand for interventions (tutors, workbooks, and extra classes) to help students perform better in school. Pandai fills the demand with a solution that is better than the alternatives.

👨‍🏫 Who We Are

The three founders are based in Malaysia and have known each other since high school, 23 years ago. 

After we graduated (from MIT & other US colleges), we started our first education company in 2007, focusing on coaching school students in STEM subjects.

We worked closely with students (many of them from underprivileged backgrounds) and saw firsthand the impact we’ve had on them. 

We then realized that with technology, we could reach more students and bring more impact. Hence, we released Pandai in 2020. 

🚀 Present & Future

Currently, we have launched in our home ground Malaysia in 2020. 

So far, 280,000 students have completed 83 million questions on Pandai, and 92% of users have seen some improvement in their academic performance. 

We plan to expand to Southeast Asia and other emerging markets, a market of 100M+ school students. Pandai is designed to be scalable, and our content (also available in English) can be mapped to other curricula from other countries.
one_liner: Learning app for school students in Southeast Asia

name: BlackOakTV
long_description: BlackOakTV is a subscription video platform hyper-serving black viewers and creators. We make it easy for black viewers to find, watch and engage with the content and creators that most reflect their lives and experiences.
one_liner: A video subscription platform serving black viewers and creators.

name: Toku
long_description: Toku helps companies increase their monthly revenue collection rate so they can focus on the their main business. Payment method management, failed payment retries, payment reminders, failed payment notifications, among others.
one_liner: Account Receivables Platform for Latin American Enterprises

name: Rebill
long_description:
Go live in less than an hour. Accept local payments, subscriptions, and installments in LATAM with a checkout built to match your ambition.
‍
Engineered for companies that set the standard.

With our platform and API, companies can integrate over 100 local payment methods from the region, including cards, bank transfers, cash, and even wallets. In addition, they always receive the best human support with fair pricing and utmost transparency, enabling them to scale across the region 10 times faster.
one_liner: Payment infrastructure designed for LATAM.

name: Azuki
long_description: Azuki: Your Digital Manga Cafe is Netflix-style Japanese comic subscription service where users can subscribe for $4.99 a month to unlock access to all the manga on the service. Free users have access to select chapters with ads.
one_liner: Japanese comic subscription service

name: Axis
long_description: Axis is a knowledge base of government regulations and officials that helps large companies do business in foreign markets. For example, if you want to operate in Saudi Arabia - our software tells you which laws you need to comply with and which officials you need approvals from. We currently cover major markets in Europe, Middle East, and Africa
one_liner: Knowledge base for corporate affairs teams

name: Durioo
long_description:
We create and license high quality Islamic cartoons and shows that kids watch on our subscription app.

We are the right team to do this because we previously created an Islamic cartoon with more than 3 billion views on YouTube.

All parents want their kids to grow up with values and virtues close to them. The same goes for Muslim parents - but the reality is - they are struggling to get high quality Islamic content for their kids.

We are addressing an underserved market of 70 million Muslim families with internet access globally.
one_liner: Streaming Platform for Muslim Children

name: Quan
long_description:
We provide a self-assessment which identifies the underlying causes of poor wellbeing and match proven solutions for individuals and teams.

https://www.quanwellbeing.com/
one_liner: End-to-end platform to improve wellbeing and team performance.

name: FlyCode
long_description:
FlyCode helps subscription merchants maximize revenue. We reduce involuntary churn by managing payment failures intelligently.

We’re Jake, Etai, and Tzachi and we’re building FlyCode.

TL;DR: If you sell SaaS or B2C subscriptions, we’re here to help you recover lost revenue due to failed payments and involuntary churn.

‘Involuntary’ or ‘Passive’ churn is a hidden Revenue Killer 💳 for Subscription Businesses

❌ THE PROBLEM: Recovering Failed Payments is Complex
Involuntary churn refers to the loss of subscribers due to payment failures, not due to them actively canceling. While it is both possible and a worthwhile strategy to attempt to win back a customer during the cancellation process — involuntary churn is not intentional and in most cases, your customers aren’t even aware that their payment failed.

💰 Bottom line?
Effective payment optimization does reduce involuntary churn and will increase ARR by as much as 5-10%

FLYCODE SOLUTION 💡
FlyCode leverages ML and AI to provide Payment Optimization and smart payment retries to maximize subscription revenue and reduce churn. We apply a unique model tailored to each Merchant and their customers to ensure optimal results.

⚡️Automatically recover failed subscription payments and reduce passive churn

⚡️Use ML & AI based payment optimization to find the best time to charge your customers

⚡️ Improve customer experience by coordinating payment retries with customer emails/SMS

🛠️ We support OOTB + Custom Integrations for Merchants and White-Label for Platforms
one_liner: Recover failed subscription payments to increase retention and LTV

name: FlexWash
long_description: Car washing is a $15B market in dire need of disruption. Legacy systems are costly, out of date, and inflexible. We are building modern solutions to help car wash operators manage and grow their business.
one_liner: The operating system for the car wash industry.

name: Sorted
long_description:
The first completely automated SaaS management software. 
Scrap the spreadsheets and avoid slack surveys when you need to run compliance audits, provisioning users, or track unused licenses. Sorted provides visibility to admins in 2 minutes without sacrificing employee flexibility.
one_liner: Instant SaaS management

name: Slicker
long_description: Slicker eliminates involuntary churn through AI-powered retries, tailored for your business. Our proprietary engine automatically monitors, detects, and recovers failed recurring payments, so you can convert past due invoices into revenue.
one_liner: Recover payment failures and maximize subscription Revenue

name: Resonance
long_description: Resonance hyper-personalizes MarTech campaign content and automatically refreshes and stores high performing content for re-use.
one_liner: Self-improving content bank for marketing

name: Autumn
long_description:
Autumn is open-source infrastructure over Stripe that allows AI startups to build their pricing plans quickly, and flexibly. We act as your app's DB and manage who's paying for what, track usage and manage customer feature access.

YC companies use us because we make it easy to handle common pricing models like usage-based, credits, subscriptions, rollovers and more in 3 functions and no webhooks. 

As you scale, you get reliable billing, that you can change however you want without wrangling code (we handle versioning, migrations etc), and manage custom pricing too. Everything you could down the line (credits, multiple subscription groups, rollovers, referral program, usage analytics, centralized team billing etc), you can drop in at any point.
one_liner: Billing infrastructure for AI

name: Lark
long_description:
Lark is building an AI native billing platform to serve the needs of fast growing AI companies. Jack and Vijit previously built Stripe’s usage-based billing system which is used by companies like Intercom and Cloudflare. Vijit also built Stripe’s customer portal which is used by customers of OpenAI and Perplexity to manage their subscriptions.

AI Pricing models are evolving fast and existing billing providers can’t keep up. During our time at Stripe, we saw deals fall through with companies like Cursor and Figma for this reason. Frustratingly, these companies had to build their billing systems in-house. 

Lark provides companies a flexible pricing engine that can support complex models like per seat credit pools and region based pricing. Finance teams can roll out pricing changes without any engineering effort. End users get an elegant billing experience. 
 
We’re starting off by building an AI powered customer portal for subscription companies. End users can use it to manage their subscriptions and resolve billing issues. Our billing agents are live with 4 customers including Midjourney and CharacterAI.
one_liner: AI Native Billing Platform
